mapper.insert: insert into TF_CREDENTIAL ( CREDENTIAL, CHECKSTATUS, CREATEDATE, OAUTHCODE) values ( #{credential, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{oauthCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update TF_CREDENTIAL
checkStatus = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
oauthCode = #{oauthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CREDENTIAL = #{credential,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select from TF_CREDENTIAL where CREDENTIAL = #{credential, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
